name: [GGJ22] Edia
description:
Edia is a game inspired by the cell phase of Spore, made during the Global Game Jam 2022.

You are a small herbivorous cell seeking to evolve. But watch out for predators looking to eat you.

How To Play ?

You can heal yourself by eating plants and you can evolve by collecting bonuses.

You direct your creature with the mouse and you move with the "Z" key of the keyboard.
